articles.description: A Total War Saga: Troy will launch exclusively on the Epic Games Store this August and it will be free for 24 hours.
articles.content: A Total War Saga: Troy will be free on the Epic Games Store when it first launches later this year.Sega announced that its upcoming strategy game, A Total War Saga: Troy, will launch on August 13 exc… [+1791 chars]
